isin.h

00001 /******************************************************************************
00002 NAME                                ISIN.H
00003 
00004 PURPOSE:    Integerized Sinusoidal Library Header - constants, data 
00005             structures and prototypes for integerized sinusoidal library 
00006             functions.
00007 
00008 PROGRAMMER                DATE          REASON
00009 ----------                ----          ------
00010 Robert Wolfe (STX)        1-2-97        Initial version.
00011 Raj Gejjagaraguppe (ARC)  1-15-97       Modified the code to work with
00012                                         GCTP software.
00013  
00014 D*****************************************************************************/
00015 
00016 
00017 #ifdef __cplusplus
00018 extern "C" {
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 /* Status returned */
00022 
00023 #define ISIN_SUCCESS 0    /* Successful return */
00024 #define ISIN_ERROR -1     /* Error return */
00025 #define ISIN_ERANGE -2    /* Input variable out of range */
00026 
00027 /* Data Structures */
00028 
00029 /* Row Type; Information for Eash Row (longitudinal band) in Projection */
00030 
00031 typedef struct {
00032   long ncol;              /* Number of columns */
00033   long icol_cen;          /* Column number to left of center of grid */
00034   double ncol_inv;        /* Number of columns inverse */
00035 } Isin_row_t;
00036 
00037 /* Handle Type; Values assigned in 'Isin_init' */
00038 
00039 typedef struct {
00040   double false_east;      /* Northing at projection origin */
00041   double false_north;     /* Easting at projection origin */
00042   double sphere;      /* Sphere radius (user's units) */
00043   double sphere_inv;      /* Sphere radius inverse (user's units) */
00044   double ang_size_inv;    /* Grid angular resolution inverse (1/rad)*/
00045   long nrow;          /* Number of rows (longitudinal zones) */
00046   long nrow_half;     /* Half of number of rows (longitudinal zones)*/
00047   double ref_lon;     /* Zero reference longitude (rad) */
00048   double lon_cen_mer;     /* Longitude of central meridian (rad) */
00049   int ijustify;       /* Justify flag (see Isin_init) */
00050   double col_dist;    /* Distance for one column in projection 
00051                * (user's units) */
00052   double col_dist_inv;    /* Distance for one column in projection inverse
00053                * (user's units) */
00054   Isin_row_t *row;    /* Row data structure */
00055   long key;       /* Data structure key */
00056 } Isin_t;
00057 
00058 
00059 /* Error Structure */
00060  
00061 typedef struct {
00062   int num;             /* Error number */
00063   char *str;           /* Error message */
00064 } error_t;
00065  
00066 
00067 /* Prototypes */
00068  
00069 /* Initialize integerized sinusoidal forward transformations */
00070  
00071 int isinusforinit(double , double, double, double, double, double); 
00072  
00073 Isin_t *Isin_for_init(double , double, double, double, long, int); 
00074 
00075 /* Initialize integerized sinusoidal inverse transformations */
00076 
00077 int isinusinvinit(double , double, double, double, double, double);
00078 
00079 Isin_t *Isin_inv_init(double , double, double, double, long, int);
00080 
00081 /* Forward mapping; converts geographic coordinates ('lon', 'lat')
00082  * to map projection coordinates ('x', 'y') */
00083 
00084 int isinusfor(double, double, double *, double *);
00085  
00086 int Isin_fwd(const Isin_t *, double, double, double *, double *); 
00087 
00088 /* Inverse mapping; converts map projection coordinates ('x', 'y') to
00089  * geographic coordinates ('lon', 'lat') */
00090 
00091 int isinusinv(double, double, double *, double *);
00092  
00093 int Isin_inv(const Isin_t *, double, double, double *, double *); 
00094 
00095 /* Deallocate the 'isin' data structure and array memory */
00096 
00097 int Isin_for_free(Isin_t *);
00098 
00099 int Isin_inv_free(Isin_t *);
00100 
00101 /* Private function to handle errors */
00102 
00103 static int Isin_error(const error_t *, const char *);
00104
